title: Kejriwal interim bail | Court draws line on ED power to arrest: Must be ‘rigid, restrictive’
selftext: “Arrest, after all, cannot be made arbitrarily and on the whims and fancies of the authorities. It is to be made on the basis of the valid 'reasons to believe', meeting the parameters prescribed by the law,” the SC said.
